name: Djenny:The Abandoned Village
description:
--Game Story:

A story of a man who went to explore an abandoned village and look for more information about people disappearing close to that village, then the villagers caught him there

explore what happened in that village then run away or you will be killed because they don't Like strangers

--- Minimum Requirement:

intel celeron n4020

6GB RAM

----------------------------------------------------

----- Tips:

-after you unZip the file you find two folder calles "easy" and "hard" choose the difficulty you want and run the game from that folder

-The Game Contains two different Endings try to explore both of them

-You can enable or disable music Going to Options On the Menu>GamePlay>Toggle On "enable music" option

-You Can enable an effect "Slow Motion + blur for '1 second'"  when an enemy Start Chasing you "Go to options in the menu>GamePlay>Toggle On the 'Enemy catch IND' option"

-the Game Does Not contain autosave you have to looke fore places where you can save you progress
